attributes.action: Change the virus wage support offered so no one gets less than minimum wage.
attributes.additional_details: Just an additional line saying no one cover by the wage support gets less than minimum wage, show your a party for the people.
attributes.background: Government are offering to cover wages to value of 80% of wages if unable to work due to coronavirus up to maximum of  £2500. No one should be paid less than minimum wage during this period. Make sure those that need the cash the most get it.

rejection.details:
The National Minimum Wage is an hourly rate of pay, not a minimum income.

We have published a petition calling on the Government to implement Universal Basic Income to give home and food security through Covid-19, which you might like to sign: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/302284

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
